Hi All


HostPlay was founded in 2004 and offering quality, reliable and affordable offshore vps hosting.
We have a rock solid infrastructure in place and guaranteed to serve you the next several years to come.

We are among the most reliable and trusted hosting services for personal and business use. We will make sure that your site gets loaded lightning fast and applications run far better as compared to any other hosting environment.

HostPlay tailored standard VPS Server plans to the needs web application developers, businesses, and web hosting resellers.

All our servers are fully managed by our specialist team according to your request



VPS Features:
* Dual Processor Xeon 5620 Servers (16 Cores) with 24 – 48 GB RAM, Raid 10

* Full Root Access
* Competitive pricing
* Fully Managed Servers

* SolusVM Control Panel
* Real rDNS
* NO HIDDEN FEES!
* NO SETUP FEE


Network & Facilities:
* Fast, Secure and Stable Network
* High Performance Servers at Our Co-location in Europe
* Choice of Network Location: Netherlands / Luxembourg / Sweden
